form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Enzi (for himself, Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Franken, Mrs. Fischer, and Mr. Heinrich) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, with respect to apportionments under the Airport Improvement Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Airport Regulation Relief Act of 2015.
Section 47114(c)(1) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.header: Special rule for fiscal years 2015 through 2017
subparagraph.text: Notwithstanding subparagraph (A), the Secretary shall apportion to the sponsor of an airport under that subparagraph, for each of fiscal years 2015, 2016, and 2017, an amount based on the number of passenger boardings at the airport during calendar year 2012 if the airport hadâ€”

clause.text: fewer than 10,000 passenger boardings during the calendar year used to calculate the apportionment for fiscal year 2015, 2016, or 2017 under subparagraph (A); and
10,000 or more passenger boardings during calendar year 2012.
